verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*:

“If \w one|strong="H4310"\w* \w ventures|strong="H5254"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H1697"\w*, \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w*? Yet \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w keep|strong="H6113"\w* \w from|strong="H1697"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4405"\w*?

\w Surely|strong="H2009"\w* \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H2388"\w* \w feeble|strong="H7504"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H6965"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* steadied \w those|strong="H3782"\w* who \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w*; \w you|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* braced \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* \w that|strong="H6965"\w* \w were|strong="H4405"\w* buckling.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* trouble \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H5060"\w* upon \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* are \w weary|strong="H3811"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5060"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* are dismayed.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* reverence \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w confidence|strong="H3690"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H8537"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*?

\w Consider|strong="H2142"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w I|strong="H2142"\w* plead: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w*, being \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*, \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w ever|strong="H4310"\w* perished? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* where have \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3582"\w*?

\w As|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w observed|strong="H7200"\w*, those who \w plow|strong="H2790"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* those who \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* same.

\w By|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* God they \w perish|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w by|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w His|strong="H3615"\w* \w anger|strong="H7307"\w* they are \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6963"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* may \w roar|strong="H7581"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* fierce \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* may growl, yet \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w broken|strong="H5421"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w lion|strong="H3833"\w* perishes \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w lack|strong="H1097"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* cubs \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6504"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* secretly; \w my|strong="H3947"\w* ears \w caught|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whisper|strong="H8102"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* disquieting \w visions|strong="H2384"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* \w falls|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* men,

\w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w and|strong="H6106"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w* \w came|strong="H7122"\w* over me \w and|strong="H6106"\w* made \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* shudder.

\w Then|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* glided \w past|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w* \w bristled|strong="H5568"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H5234"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w discern|strong="H5234"\w* \w its|strong="H5975"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w*; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* loomed \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* whispering \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*:

‘\w Can|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mortal \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w more|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w* \w than|strong="H6663"\w* God, \w or|strong="H2891"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w more|strong="H6213"\w* \w pure|strong="H2891"\w* \w than|strong="H6663"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w His|strong="H7760"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w charges|strong="H7760"\w* \w His|strong="H7760"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w with|strong="H7760"\w* \w error|strong="H8417"\w*,

how much more those who \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*, whose \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, who \w can|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1792"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*!

\w They|strong="H1242"\w* are \w smashed|strong="H3807"\w* \w to|strong="H1242"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w* \w from|strong="H7760"\w* \w dawn|strong="H1242"\w* \w to|strong="H1242"\w* dusk; unnoticed, \w they|strong="H1242"\w* perish \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*.

\w Are|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* tent \w cords|strong="H3499"\w* \w pulled|strong="H5265"\w* up, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*?’
